channel.title: RSC Unlimited - RSC Private Server
channel.description:
Welcome to RSC Unlimited, the Runescape Classic Private Server
[url=http://www.rscunlimited.net][img]http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/3811/screenshot20130131at101.png[/img][/url]
Website: [url=http://rscunlimited.net/]RSC Unlimited[/url] Webclient: [url=http://rscunlimited.net/play]Webclient[/url] Client Download: [url=http://www.rscunlimited.net/download.php?c=Client_Download]Download Client[/url]
To play the game: 1. Register on Forums 2. Go to "My Characters" to create an in-game character 3. Download the client or go on the Webclient 4. Login and play
Exp rate: 20x (30x for subscribers)
Features:
* Base Source: DarkQuest by Peeter + large amount of bug fixes, improvements, enhancements, security updates * Double Click JAR Client / Webclient * 21 Fully working Quests (including 3 members quests) [These quests are down to perfection of replication of original RSC] * Perfected Tutorial Island scripting (Starting location for new players) + ability to skip * 4 Different Client Sizes (Small, Medium, Big, Huge) * Drop rates + Items calculated to minimize inflation (extremely similar to original RSC's with some minor adjustments) * Fully working Runecrafting skill + essence mine * Fully working Agility skill * Fully working Dwarf Multi Cannon * Minigames! (Last Man Standing, CTF, Hide n Seek, Tournaments, Global War, Holiday Drops, Quiz, World Drop, Nazi Zombies) * Absolutely ALL dupe methods have been fixed * Party / Clan system (GUI/GFX enabled) * Bot detection * IRC [irc.rizon.net - #rscu] * Arcade * Many more aspects to the website / server (I will construct a full list later)
In-Game Screenies:
Adjustable Screen Size: (Huge shown) [IMG]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/3811/screenshot20130131at101.png[/img]
Tutorial Island: (use ::skiptututorial if you wish to skip it) [IMG]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/3811/screenshot20130131at101.png[/img]
Agility: [IMG]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/3811/screenshot20130131at101.png[/img]
Rune Essence Mine: (For Runecrafting skill) [IMG]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/1294/screenshot20130131at935.png[/img]
Smithing GUI: [IMG]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/4176/screenshot20130131at933.png[/img]
Spirit Tree Teleport System [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screenshot0.png[/img]
DM (DeathMatch Arena) [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screenshot1.png[/img]
KBD Intelligence [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screenshot3.png[/img]
Quests: (Lost City shown) [IMG]http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/3811/screenshot20130131at101.png[/img]
RSC Sleep System: [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_91321_pm.png[/img]
Absolutely F2P ONLY Wilderness (includes spells, equipment, food, boosts, etc) [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_92826_pm.png[/img]
Enhanced Sprites Toggle (Optional) [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_93255_pm.png[/img] [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screenshot5.png[/img]
Skill Interface (All skills are batched + Runecrafting skill) [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_92208_pm.png[/img]
Quest Interface (23 Fully replicated RSC quests with exact dialogues) [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_91903_pm.png[/img]
Info Interface [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_91915_pm.png[/img]
IRC Chatroom [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_92350_pm.png[/img]
Fully Automated Donation System [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_92422_pm.png[/img]
Highscores [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_92449_pm.png[/img]
Item Database [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_92522_pm.png[/img]
Npc Database [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_92537_pm.png[/img]
Skill Database (Herblaw shown) [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_92612_pm.png[/img]
10K+ registered users [img]http://www.rscunlimited.net/uploads/7095_screen_shot_2013-03-22_at_92635_pm.png[/img]
Note: This project used to be named RSC Revamped, but does not rely on the old source

item.title: RSC Unlimited - RSC Private Server
item.dc:creator: @marc110 marc110
item.description:
@marc110 wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:22, topic:481063"][quote author=Wife Beater link=topic=599301.msg4212999#msg4212999 date=1359844683]

Computer is perfectly fine and runs every server ive ever tried to play… i guess some just aren’t worthwhile eh

To be perfectly honest with you, if your computer cant run my server, then it is nothing but a heap of shit. Try running it again perhaps? Are you using some weird browser? Even my iphone can run it via Cloud Browse
[/quote]
You know that even PC’s from 1998-2000 can run RSC client right? It’s not like it’s a brand new game which requires a high end PC to run. It’s just retarded to assume that the problem is in the players end. The client is supposed to run on all machines, not just few…

If I were you I would fix up my attitude before running a server.[/quote]
correct rsc will run on a netbook

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Unlimited - RSC Private Server
item.dc:creator: @Wife_Beater Wife Beater
item.description:
@Wife_Beater wrote:

[quote=“Classickbds, post:26, topic:481063”][quote author=inspectah link=topic=599301.msg4213575#msg4213575 date=1359918079]
Ikr… Way to attract players eh?

I’d know if it was my computer… like i said, ive ran every server ive ever played straight away without any problems. I point out a problem with your server and boom, Cant handle it.

Fyi… Client opens then closes, and webclient fails to load fully. i hope anyone who has this problem in the future is met with a better response than blaming their computer.
[/quote]

I agree with Inspectah, this is Red Zaj. The server is the problem. I don’t think my brand new Intel i7 3770k with Nvidia GeForce GTX 570 graphics card is the problem. It’s the owner of the server that needs a brand new “COMPUTER”[/quote]

Some accounts were nulled. Yeah it was my fault, but its fixed now pl ease rereigster your characters

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Unlimited - RSC Private Server
item.dc:creator: @Classickbds Classickbds
item.description:
@Classickbds wrote:

[quote=“inspectah, post:2, topic:481416”]Ikr… Way to attract players eh?

I’d know if it was my computer… like i said, ive ran every server ive ever played straight away without any problems. I point out a problem with your server and boom, Cant handle it.

Fyi… Client opens then closes, and webclient fails to load fully. i hope anyone who has this problem in the future is met with a better response than blaming their computer.[/quote]

I agree with Inspectah, this is Red Zaj. The server is the problem. I don’t think my brand new Intel i7 3770k with Nvidia GeForce GTX 570 graphics card is the problem. It’s the owner of the server that needs a brand new “COMPUTER”

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Unlimited - RSC Private Server
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“inspectah, post:24, topic:481063”]I have my Java settings to auto update and it had an update a few days ago… so i know my Java is fine. I’ll try the cache clear one more time. Other than that ive not experienced a problem like this before, as i said earlier when it comes to new servers i never had a problem before.

Just cleared my Cache tried again and same problem. Think i’ll stick to the servers that want me to play them lol.[/quote]
Java 7 is known to be incompatible with XStream which is used to load the cache items, anims and npcs and so on, but I just checked it out and it works fine for me using Java 7. So I doubt that’s the problem, you should probably try running it via batch so it shows the error.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Unlimited - RSC Private Server
item.dc:creator: @inspectah inspectah
item.description:
@inspectah wrote:

I have my Java settings to auto update and it had an update a few days ago… so i know my Java is fine. I’ll try the cache clear one more time. Other than that ive not experienced a problem like this before, as i said earlier when it comes to new servers i never had a problem before.

Just cleared my Cache tried again and same problem. Think i’ll stick to the servers that want me to play them lol.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Unlimited - RSC Private Server
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“inspectah, post:2, topic:481416”]Ikr… Way to attract players eh?

I’d know if it was my computer… like i said, ive ran every server ive ever played straight away without any problems. I point out a problem with your server and boom, Cant handle it.

Fyi… Client opens then closes, and webclient fails to load fully. i hope anyone who has this problem in the future is met with a better response than blaming their computer.[/quote]
What version of Java are you using? I’d also try to delete the cache, if it had downloaded any bits of it.

Read full topic

Computer is perfectly fine and runs every server ive ever tried to play… i guess some just aren’t worthwhile eh
[/quote]

To be perfectly honest with you, if your computer cant run my server, then it is nothing but a heap of shit. Try running it again perhaps? Are you using some weird browser? Even my iphone can run it via Cloud Browse[/quote]
You know that even PC’s from 1998-2000 can run RSC client right? It’s not like it’s a brand new game which requires a high end PC to run. It’s just retarded to assume that the problem is in the players end. The client is supposed to run on all machines, not just few…

If I were you I would fix up my attitude before running a server.

item.title: RSC Unlimited - RSC Private Server
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

Cloud browse doesn’t allow you to run java applets directly on your phone, it sends a snapshot of a VPS to your phone

Read full topic
